name: Georg Fuchsbauer
content: Georg Fuchsbauer georg fuchsbauer Assoc. Prof. in the Security and Privacy group at TU Wien, Vienna, Austria, part of the Cybersecurity Center TU Wien, leading the WWTF project COnFIDE – Cryptographic Foundations of Privacy in Distributed Ledgers, PI of the FWF-SFB project SPyCoDe – Semantic and Cryptographic Foundations of Security and Privacy by Compositional Design. Previously Inria research scientist in the Crypto Team at École normale supérieure (2016–2019), visiting scientist at the Simons Institute at UC Berkeley (autumn '19). PhD from Université Paris VII in 2011, supervised by David Pointcheval, then postdoc in the cryptography groups at Bristol University and at IST Austria. contact Email:   firstName . lastName ∂ tuwien . ac . at recent preprints Z.
